name: arch::cpu::local::get_base

x86_64::instructions::segmentation::Segm.doc:
Reads the segment base address

 ## Exceptions

 If [`CR4.FSGSBASE`][Cr4Flags::FSGSBASE] is not set, this instruction will throw a `#UD`.

doc: Gets the base address for the CPU local storage by reading the GS base model-specific register.
